item.title: DVWA - Command Injection
item.description: Command injection is a common vulnerability in real world even nowadays…

item.title: Steganography - Hiding secret(s) Inside A File
item.description: Steganography is the practice of representing information within another message or physical object.1 Pengertian & Sejarah Steganography Pengertian steganography [selanjutnya saya singkat dengan stego] memang sesederhana “ilmu dan seni menyembunyikan pesan atau informasi rahasia di dalam pesan lain”.
